p: The estimated average hospitalization rate in the main hospital’s catchment area was 12.4% (95% CI 10.9–14.1), similar to results found in [ 24]. Accordingly, 12,194 infections (95% CI 10,723–13,872), corresponding to a disease incidence of 234 per 10,000 individuals (95% CI 206–266), may have occurred in the area from January 1, 2013, to March 13, 2017.
